column4: Experimenting done. After the reboot I discovered that everything is working, though a /etc/init.d/networking restart wasn't enough to do that before the reboot. I also discovered that installing Ubuntu fragged my Debian installation. What is this, the next Windows??
Ubuntu has nothing to do with your debian install going bad
It'd be a _BIG_ coincidence if it "just happened" in synchronicity.
If you have a question, please ask, but dont go spreading FUD in here
This is not a discussion room...  Please take it offtopic
I see no facts just your opinion and disruption
